resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index",
    mappings={
        "_source": {
            "excludes": [
                "content_embedding"
            ]
        },
        "properties": {
            "content_embedding": {
                "type": "sparse_vector"
            },
            "content": {
                "type": "text"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
